content_html: Gandaki, Sept 15: Considering the approaching festivals, fair price shops have been opened in Pokhara from today. Chief of Food Management and Trade Company, Gandaki Province Office, Pokhara, Kaushal Ghimire, shared that the fair price shops would be run till October 27, targeting the upcoming festivals—Dashain

summary: Gandaki, Sept 15: Considering the approaching festivals, fair price shops have been opened in Pokhara from today. Chief of Food Management and Trade Company, Gandaki Province Office, Pokhara, Kaushal Ghimire, shared that the fair price shops would be run till October 27, targeting the upcoming festivals—Dashain
title: Fair price shops in Pokhara
